name: 廖華彥
objective:
本課主旨在設計課程，提供練習，俾使學生嫻熟全民英檢的英語測驗，希冀能夠藉由本課程的修習，提升學生不斷的學習外國語的興致，並且，藉由通過考試取得證照，增加未來職場的競爭力。
This course is designed to familiarize the students with General English Proficiency Test. It is our hope that students who finish taking the course will go on with their enthusiasm on studying foreign languages; besides, through the acquisition of the certificate when the students pass the tests, they are sure to enhance their capability in the increasingly competitive job markets.
